abstract: The officer the bank replaced, Amy Woods Brinkley, was one of the highest ranking women on Wall Street. More board members may depart in coming weeks.
snippet: The officer the bank replaced, Amy Woods Brinkley, was one of the highest ranking women on Wall Street. More board members may depart in coming weeks.
lead_paragraph: Facing pressure from federal regulators to improve its risk oversight, Bank of America forced out its chief risk officer on Thursday and continued a shake-up of its board.

headline.main: Bank of America Ousts Head of Risk Oversight
headline.print_headline: Bank of America Ousts Head of Risk Oversight

byline.original: By Louise Story and Eric Dash

abstract: Facing pressure from U.S. regulators to improve its risk oversight, Bank of America forced out its chief risk officer and continued a shake-up of its board.
snippet: Facing pressure from U.S. regulators to improve its risk oversight, Bank of America forced out its chief risk officer and continued a shake-up of its board.
lead_paragraph: Facing pressure from federal regulators to improve its risk oversight, Bank of America forced out its chief risk officer Thursday and continued a shake-up of its board, The New York Times’s Louise Story and Eric Dash reported.

headline.main: Bank of America Ousts Head of Risk Oversight

abstract: Moving to address concerns from regulators that the bank’s board lacks financial acumen, Bank of America plans to announce later Friday that its board has elected four new directors.
snippet: Moving to address concerns from regulators that the bank’s board lacks financial acumen, Bank of America plans to announce later Friday that its board has elected four new directors.
lead_paragraph: Update | 4:04 p.m. From Louise Story, a DealBook colleague:

headline.main: Bank of America Names 4 New Directors
